title: HESTIA Wireless Garage Door Sensor Alarm - Smart Home Security System, No Monthly Fee
features: 【Award-Winning British Brand】: Recognised as a finalist for ‘Product Innovation of the Year 2023’ and ‘Security Solution of the Year 2024’ at the London Construction Awards, and ‘Innovative Security Project 2024’ at the British Security Awards.

【Real-Time Notifications】: Compatible with HESTIA Control Panels and Cube Gateway(sold separately), get real-time notifications once connected with the compatible hubs for instant alerts of garage door activity
【Long Battery Life】: 1x23A12V easy replaceable battery provides extended battery life for continuous operation for up to 2 years.
【Wireless Parameters】: 433.92 MHZ strong wireless connectivity for reliable communication up to 50 meters, or up to 500m with a signal extender (sold separately).
【No Monthly Fees】: The Hestia wireless home alarm system offers top-tier security without subscription costs. Enjoy reliable protection while saving money on long-term security solutions.

【Extensive Sensor Compatibility】: Connect up to 96 sensors to the Cube or 200 with the 7.0" Control Hub, including motion sensors, wireless solar sirens, keypads, window vibration sensors, water leak detectors, and garage sensors. Enjoy complete protection tailored to your needs.
【Trusted British Quality】: Proudly part of the SAFE-TECH brand, trusted by hundreds of electrical wholesalers, including national names like B&Q, CEF, Edmundson Electrical, and YESSS.
description: Product Description Hestia, BSA & LCA Finalist Security System 2024 Hestia is part of the SAFE-TECH brand family. Our best security system yet HESTIA Garage Door Sensor What's in the box 1 x Garage Door Contact Sensor, 1 x Double Side Tape, 2 x Screws & Plugs, 1 x User Manual. Wireless parameters Benefit from strong wireless connectivity utilising the 433.92MHz frequency, connect up to 50m or 500m with an extender. Heavy duty metal body Providing long-life duty and intelligent security monitoring to your garage against potential threats. Wireless sensor Powered by a single 23A12V battery, this sensor ensures a dependable energy source, offering continuous surveillance. Complete protection Hestia Garage Door Sensor Add To Basket Hestia Smart Cube Buying Options 7.0" Control Panel Add To Basket Wireless Doorbell Add To Basket HestiaI PIR Motion Sensor Add To Basket Door Contact Sensor Add To Basket Emergency Panic Button Add To Basket Price £39.90 £ 39 . 90 — £249.90 £ 249 . 90 £9.90 £ 9 . 90 £19.90 £ 19 . 90 £14.90 £ 14 . 90 £14.90 £ 14 . 90 Power 23A 12V (Replaceable) DC5V Type-C / Battery DC12V / DC5V Type-C / Battery 23A 12V AA (Replaceable) 2x CR2450 (Replaceable) 23A 12V Battery life 2 years* Battery 48h Battery 72h 2 years* 2 years* 2 years* 2 years* Connectivity RF 433MHz WiFi 2.4 GHz / RF / eV1527 WiFi 2.4 GHz / RF / Bluetooth RF RF RF RF Wireless Range 50m / 500m with Extender 50m / 500m with Extender 50m / 500m with Extender 50m / 500m with Extender 50m / 500m with Extender 50m / 500m with Extender 50m / 500m with Extender Tamper-proof ✘ ✔ ✔ ✘ ✔ ✘ ✘ Compatibility 7.0" / 4.3 Panel / Cube Fob / Hestia App Hestia App 7.0" / 4.3 Panel / Cube 7.0" / 4.3 Panel / Cube 7.0" / 4.3 Panel / Cube 7.0" / 4.3 Panel / Cube Previous page Next page 1 SAFE-TECH 2 Hestia 3 All-In-One 4 Solutions 5 Smarter The video showcases the product in use.
